com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.map

Class TileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.map.TileMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IsometricMap, OrthogonalMap

    public abstract class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Used as a skeleton for all tile maps.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

      • getBoundingShapes

        public <T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D> com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<T> getBoundingShapes(java.lang.Class<T> tClass,
                                                                                                   int index)
        Returns a list of bounding shapes found with the same type and tiled map layer index.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specifies only Shape2D types can be provided.
        Parameters:
        tClass - Used to 'identify' the shape's class type.
        index - The layer ID to get the shapes from.
        Returns:
        Bounding shape list.

      • boundingShapesToPhysicsWorld

        public void boundingShapesToPhysicsWorld(int index,
                                         com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                                         float PPM)
        Adds all applicable Shape2D objects, Rectangle and Polygon, from the indexed layer into the provided physics world.
        Parameters:
        index - The layer ID to get the shapes from.
        world - The physics world to add the shapes to.
        PPM - Pixel to meter conversion.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes map and renderer in the object from memory. Should be called if the map is no longer in use.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
